attributes.action: Have Boris Johnson awarded a GBE for services to the people.
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson has shown his leadership in true form to his character. For standing up for the people, pushing Brexit, delivering Brexit, and now, handling the Coronavirus outbreak in exceptional form.

Our new Churchill should be honoured for his continuous effort in the fight against the virus, support of the NHS and dedication to the people of the UK, against all who stand against him.

A true leader in time of war, which we face in 2020
attributes.background: Give Boris Johnson a GBE for services to the people of the United Kingdom

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
